trans-unit.source: Used for accessing the information in the WebSocket handshake.
trans-unit.target: 用來存取 WebSocket 交握中的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketContext" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The cookies that were passed to the server during the opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 在開啟信號交換期間傳遞至伺服器的 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP headers that were sent to the server during the opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 在開啟信號交換期間傳送至伺服器的 HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Whether the WebSocket client is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket 用戶端是否通過驗證。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: Whether the WebSocket client connected from the local machine.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket 用戶端是否從本機電腦連線。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: Whether the WebSocket connection is secured using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).
trans-unit.target: 是否 WebSocket 連線是使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 保護的。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Origin HTTP header included in the opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 包含在開頭信號交換的原始 HTTP 標頭值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI requested by the WebSocket client.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket 用戶端所要求的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the SecWebSocketKey HTTP header included in the opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 包含在開頭信號交換的 SecWebSocketKey HTTP 標頭值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the SecWebSocketKey HTTP header included in the opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 包含在開頭信號交換的 SecWebSocketKey HTTP 標頭值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The list of subprotocols requested by the WebSocket client.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket 用戶端所要求的附屬通訊協定的清單。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: An object used to obtain identity, authentication information, and security roles for the WebSocket client.
trans-unit.target: 用來取得 WebSocket 用戶端之識別、驗證資訊及安全性角色的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" />。

trans-unit.source: The WebSocket instance used to interact (send/receive/close/etc) with the WebSocket connection.
trans-unit.target: 用來與 WebSocket 連接互動 (傳送/接收/關閉等) 的 WebSocket 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" />。
